errors.error_description: The installation instructions include `tensorflow`, which is a large and unnecessary dependency for a project focused on ontology definitions.
correction_candidates: The installation command should be `conda install tensorflow rdflib`.
The installation command should be `pip install uco`.
The installation command should only include the necessary library: `pip install rdflib`.
The installation command should be `pip install rdflib owlready2`.
errors.golden_answer: The installation command should only include the necessary library: `pip install rdflib`.

errors.error_description: The command `git pull` is used to download the repository for the first time, which is incorrect. `git clone` is the correct command for this purpose.
correction_candidates: To get the repository, use the command `git clone https://github.com/unified-cyber-ontology/uco.git`.
To get the repository, use the command `git fetch https://github.com/unified-cyber-ontology/uco.git`.
To get the repository, first initialize a directory with `git init` and then run `git pull https://github.com/unified-cyber-ontology/uco.git`.
To get the repository, use the command `git checkout https://github.com/unified-cyber-ontology/uco.git`.
errors.golden_answer: To get the repository, use the command `git clone https://github.com/unified-cyber-ontology/uco.git`.
